sentence.text: The expression of uncarboxylated cartilage condensation (ucMGP), carboxylated MGP (cMGP), matrix metalloproteinase (MMP)‑13, collagen cardiac muscle tissue development X, collagen type II, tumor necrosis factor (negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II)‑α and interleukin (IL)‑1β were detected by ELISA, immunohistochemistry, reverse transcription‑quantitative polymerase chain reaction and western blotting.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
